# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The background color of the bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The bar layers the specified color on top of any blur effects you specified in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarAppearance/backgroundEffect] property, and below the image in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarAppearance/backgroundImage] property.

## Configuring the background appearance

- **backgroundEffect**: The blur effect to apply to the bar’s background.
- **backgroundImage**: The image to display on top of the bar’s background color.
- **backgroundImageContentMode**: The content mode to use when displaying the bar’s background image.
